title: Bi-Weekly Gaming Discussion Thread
selftext:
What are you playing, r/India? Let us use this thread to discuss any games you're playing, have played or are going to play. (Mobile and board games included!)

What game are you looking forward to? Are you a developer? Show us your wares!

Please don't just list the names of games, make sure to write a word or two about them as well.

Check out r/IndianGaming! They are an active community and also host a few co-op sessions.

**Gaming Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Gaming+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/xagdqefyv8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=f975f1c3093a3d9598a1da39854b03d1250bd55d
comments:
Assassin's Creed Syndicate, been on a run to experience the Assassin's Creed franchise lately.

Syndicate, boy oh boy is an under-rated gem. It's a shame that after the epic fail launch fest of Unity, people downright ignored this game.

Right now, I am looking forward to the Witcher 3 upgrade.

Been playing Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow. 

I've become a huge fan of Splinter Cell ever since I tried Chaos Theory. There's just something about using light and shadows to sneak and infiltrate. 

Too bad Ubisoft decided to fuck the franchise.
Ubisoft is shit man... They are just trying to mint money now... Idk what the head devs and product managers are thinking... Sam Fisher still had many stories to tell...

Valo, Apex, R6 PUBG at times... Just MP games... SP is gone monotonous... But...

Ghostwire Tokyo is beauty... I'd suggest everyone to try it out at least...
Played Metal Gear 2 and Metal Gear Solid back to back. Grey Fox's story now hits harder while playing MGS.

Football manager 22, been playing since two weeks.

Message me if anyone's interested in doing an online save
I am not a hardcore gamer but I have ordered an xbox series X over a PS5. I dont really play online that much. Just single player stuff for me. What are the disadvantages of owning an xbox?
Playstation has better single player exclusives.
Bloodborne, The Last of Us, Days Gone, Uncharted, Horizon Zero Dawn, God of War to name a few.
ah I fucked up. Was looking forward to playing ragnarok

Was playing Vampire Survivors a lot.

Now gone back to Hollow Knight.

Also just bought AOE 2: Definitive Edition. Looking forward to that.
got back into oolite after a long while. controls are usually confusing for beginners but what a chill game. also got back into taiko, but i can't move beyond five stars to save my life ðŸ—¿

>oolite 

Ayo AOE2(the original edition) was one of my first pc games.  Great game
Try getting gamepass ultimate and play any game from the hundreds of listed one that might interest you
Elden ring. Now I'll see you guys in a month..;)
It will take me months ðŸ¥²
